EmailTemplate.subject: EuroShop 2023: Innovation Awaits from NCR at Hall 6/Stand C03!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Will we see you at EuroShop 2023? Come by and visit NCR at Hall 6 / Stand C03 to learn how we transform, connect and run our customers’ technology platforms. You can also explore our latest advancements that help you run your store end to end, simplify your operations and deliver the best experiences that differentiate your brand. With innovation in mind, we will demonstrate how our new, AI-driven computer vision checkout technology can take your customer experience to the next level. Want to see it in action at our stand? Learn more here <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/ncr-halo-checkout?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2023_February_EuroShop_Retail&utm_content=PreEventEmail1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]>.  And if you haven’t yet scheduled a one-on-one consultation <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/euroshop-2023?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2023_February_EuroShop_Retail&utm_content=PreEventEmail1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]> with the NCR team at EuroShop, we hope you’ll take a moment to do so now.
